search_results.title: Thanks & Recognition - In Memoriam: Dr. Harry Stone
search_results.snippet: Dr. Harry Stone taught at the CSUN Department of English for 32 years from 1960 to 1992. Dr. Stone died on December 17, 2021 at the age of 95.
